Uses of Interface
org.ingatan.data.IQuestion

Packages that use IQuestion
org.ingatan.component.librarymanager Subcomponents of the library manager, as well as the LibraryManagerWindow itself. 
org.ingatan.component.quiztime The quiz window and settings dialog, as well as the TableQuestionUnit which is central to how TableQuestions are broken up and arranged in a sensible order. 
org.ingatan.data Data encapsulation classes. 
org.ingatan.io Classes that deal with general input and output of data, including parsing and writing, zip packaging, and the generation of quizzes.
